Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the interior is covered with a glossy dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of one line of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394351) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394351)
